You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesN N] > &nscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Nscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4A9.
  * `&nscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4C3.
